```{r}
devtools::install_github("hirscheylab/tidybiology")


library(devtools)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidybiology)

data("chromosome")
data("proteins")

chrom_stats <- chromosome %>%
  summarise(across(c(variations, protein_codinggenes, mi_rna),
                   list(mean=mean, median=median, max=max), na.rm=TRUE))
chrom_stats

ggplot(chromosome, aes(x=basepairs)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=30, fill="steelblue", alpha=0.7) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title="Chromosome Size Distribution", x="Basepairs", y="Count")

ggplot(chromosome, aes(x=basepairs, y=protein_codinggenes)) +
  geom_point(color="darkred", alpha=0.7) +
  geom_smooth(method="lm", se=FALSE, color="black") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title="Protein-coding genes vs Chromosome length", 
       x="Chromosome basepairs", y="Protein coding genes")

ggplot(chromosome, aes(x=basepairs, y=mi_rna)) +
  geom_point(color="darkgreen", alpha=0.7) +
  geom_smooth(method="lm", se=FALSE, color="black") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title="miRNAs vs Chromosome length", 
       x="Chromosome basepairs", y="miRNAs")

prot_stats <- proteins %>%
  summarise(across(c(length, mass),
                   list(mean=mean, median=median, max=max), na.rm=TRUE))
prot_stats

ggplot(proteins, aes(x=length, y=mass)) +
  geom_point(alpha=0.6, color="purple") +
  geom_smooth(method="lm", se=FALSE, color="orange") +
  theme_classic(base_size=14) +
  labs(title="Protein length vs mass", x="Length", y="Mass")

sessionInfo()



```
